com.connectsdk.device

Class DefaultConnectableDeviceStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.connectsdk.device.DefaultConnectableDeviceStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectableDeviceStore

    public class DefaultConnectableDeviceStore
extends Object
implements ConnectableDeviceStore
    Default implementation of ConnectableDeviceStore. It stores data in a file in application data directory.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Date (in seconds from 1970) that the ConnectableDeviceStore was last updated.

      Current version of the ConnectableDeviceStore, may be necessary for migrations

    • Method Detail

      • addDevice

        public void addDevice(ConnectableDevice device)
        Description copied from interface: ConnectableDeviceStore
        Add a ConnectableDevice to the ConnectableDeviceStore. If the ConnectableDevice is already stored, it's record will be updated.
        Specified by:
        addDevice in interface ConnectableDeviceStore
        Parameters:
        device - ConnectableDevice to add to the ConnectableDeviceStore

      • removeDevice

      • removeAll

        public void removeAll()
        Description copied from interface: ConnectableDeviceStore
        Clears out the ConnectableDeviceStore, removing all records.

      • getStoredDevices

        public org.json.JSONObject getStoredDevices()
        Specified by:
        getStoredDevices in interface ConnectableDeviceStore
        Returns:
        a JSONObject of all ConnectableDevices in the ConnectableDeviceStore. To get a strongly-typed ConnectableDevice object, use the `getDevice(String);` method.

      • getDevice

        public ConnectableDevice getDevice(String uuid)
        Description copied from interface: ConnectableDeviceStore
        Gets a ConnectableDevice object for a provided id. The id may be for the ConnectableDevice object or any of the DeviceServices.
        Specified by:
        getDevice in interface ConnectableDeviceStore
        Parameters:
        uuid - Unique ID for a ConnectableDevice or any of its DeviceService objects
        Returns:
        ConnectableDevice object if a matching uuit was found, otherwise will return null

      • getServiceConfig

        public ServiceConfig getServiceConfig(ServiceDescription serviceDescription)
        Description copied from interface: ConnectableDeviceStore
        Gets a ServcieConfig object for a provided UUID. This is used by DiscoveryManager to retain crucial service information between sessions (pairing code, etc).
        Specified by:
        getServiceConfig in interface ConnectableDeviceStore
        Parameters:
        serviceDescription - Description for the service
        Returns:
        ServiceConfig object if matching description was found, otherwise will return null
